openers: Detective, the body of [Victim] has been found last night.  Get over there and investigate his body.  Only 5 people aside from the victim were missing from the festivities last night at Town Hall, so be sure to question them: [Green], [Yellow], [Red], [Black], and [Blue].  I want a suspect with a means, motive, and opportunity by the third night from now.  Once you have a case, find me in the Town Hall to the north.  - [Purple] | Press J to open the journal.
